meanings.definition: A painting or carving on two hinged panels.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient diptychs showcasing intricate carvings.
meanings.sent2: She admired the diptychs in the art gallery, each panel telling a different story.
meanings.sent3: The diptychs on the doors seemed to come alive, telling tales of the past.
meanings.sent4: The diptychs stood like guardians, their panels opening a window to another era.
meanings.sent5: The diptychs captured moments in time, frozen in their wooden frames.

meanings.definition: A set of two related works of art or literature.
meanings.sent1: The library showcased diptychs of classic novels, each volume complementing the other.
meanings.sent2: The diptychs of paintings by the same artist hung side by side in the exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The diptychs of poems danced together on the pages, creating a harmonious duet.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like diptychs, two individuals united in a shared journey.
meanings.sent5: The diptychs of music notes intertwined, creating a beautiful melody of words.
